body.p:
The State of Ohio
Hamilton County } SS:

On this fourth day of July A. D. 1863 before me, a Notary Public for the County and state aforesaid, came William B. Sheppard, who being duly sworn according to law declares and says that he will "well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his station" as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky.
Sworn to before me and subscribed in my presence this 4th day of July A D 1863.

F K D.
